commands.command: bash -lc "set -euo pipefail; npx kill-port 3000 3001 3002 || true; NX_TUI=false nx run-many --target=serve --projects=3000-home,3001-shop,3002-checkout --configuration=development --parallel=3 & SERVE_PID=$!; cleanup(){ kill $SERVE_PID 2>/dev/null || true; npx kill-port 3000 3001 3002 || true; }; trap cleanup EXIT; wait-on tcp:3000 tcp:3001 tcp:3002; NX_TUI=false nx run 3000-home:e2e"

bash -lc "set -euo pipefail; npx kill-port 3000 3001 3002 || true; NX_TUI=false nx run-many --target=build --projects=3000-home,3001-shop,3002-checkout --configuration=production --parallel=9; NX_TUI=false nx run-many --target=serve --projects=3000-home,3001-shop,3002-checkout --configuration=production --parallel=3 & SERVE_PID=$!; cleanup(){ kill $SERVE_PID 2>/dev/null || true; npx kill-port 3000 3001 3002 || true; }; trap cleanup EXIT; wait-on tcp:3000 tcp:3001 tcp:3002; NX_TUI=false nx run 3000-home:e2e"
